blogs.description: The new age of AI subscriptions
blogs.author: Ishan

blogs.title: TikTok-fication of Everything
blogs.description: Everything now a days is either TikTok or trying to be TikTok. But why is this happening? What is TikTok doing that is so different from other social media platforms? And what does this mean for the future of social media?
blogs.author: Ishan

blogs.title: Social Media Part 1
blogs.description: Yes. I know. Social media is a blogger's favorite topic to talk about. It is a topic that so needed to be talked about, but so cliched, that most people are like eh it's a choice afterall. But what happens when it no longer is a choice. What happens when social media is shoved down our throats. Is there anything we can do about it then
blogs.author: Ishan Joshi
